function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of uncertainty and instability in global supply chains","Impact":"Increased risk and vulnerability in the supply chain","Mitigation":"Implementing end-to-end synchronisation, collaboration, and visibility across the supply chain","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time tracking systems","People":"Supply chain managers, stakeholders in the supply chain","Owner":"Supply chain managers, companies"},{"Description":"Lack of proper models for sustainable and effective distribution strategies","Impact":"Limited long-term sustainability and effectiveness of distribution strategies","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing proper distribution models, embracing technology-driven distribution strategies","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, machine learning for demand forecasting, automation in distribution","People":"Supply chain managers, distribution personnel","Owner":"Supply chain managers, distribution companies"},{"Description":"Complexity of the supply chain due to globalisation","Impact":"Increased complexity and uncertainty in supply and demand","Mitigation":"Utilizing technology for cost reduction, planning, and access to labor and markets","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization software, global sourcing platforms, workforce management tools","People":"Supply chain managers, global sourcing personnel","Owner":"Supply chain managers, global sourcing companies"}]}
